themes: Need for diversified arts funding beyond city sources
Barriers created by insurance requirements for artists
Collaboration with private foundations and donors
Outdated contractor requirements in city departments
key_phrases: severe lack of [funding] outside of current city funding
natural place to direct private foundations and donors
Austin has long been lacking in major arts funders outside of the HOT funds and Moody Foundation investments
review of insurance requirements for artists
the cost of insurance exceeding the amount the vendor would be paid by the City
barriers_identified: severe lack of arts funding outside city sources
outdated contractor requirements in city departments
solutions_proposed: ACME work with the Austin Community Foundation to develop a Fund that could expand funding opportunities for the arts
direct private foundations and donors to new funding mechanisms
review and update insurance requirements for artists to participate in city programs
